saf.core.ui.event

Interface DockableFrameListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDockingManager, DockableFrameAdapter

    public interface DockableFrameListener
    Listener interface for dockable events. Classes interested in receiveing notification of dockable minimization, maximization, floating, closing and restoration should implement this interface and add themselves to the dockableManager.
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Invoked when a dockable is closed.

      Invoked when a dockable is maximized.

      Invoked when a dockable receives a minimizing request.
      void dockableRestored(DockableFrameEvent evt)
      Invoked when a dockable is restored to its default docking position from a floated, minimized, or maximized state.
      void dockableRestoring(DockableFrameEvent evt)
      Invoked when a dockable receives a restore request.

    • Method Detail

      • dockableClosed

        void dockableClosed(DockableFrameEvent evt)
        Invoked when a dockable is closed.
        Parameters:
        evt - the detailes of the close event

      • dockableClosing

        void dockableClosing(DockableFrameEvent evt)
        Invoked when a dockable receives a close request. The close can be overriden by setting the events handled property to true.
        Parameters:
        evt - details the close request

      • dockableFloating

        void dockableFloating(DockableFrameEvent evt)
        Invoked when a dockable receives a float request. The float can be overriden by setting the events handled property to true.
        Parameters:
        evt - details the float request

      • dockableRestoring

        void dockableRestoring(DockableFrameEvent evt)
        Invoked when a dockable receives a restore request. The restore can be overriden by setting the events handled property to true.
        Parameters:
        evt - details the restore request

      • dockableMinimizing

        Invoked when a dockable receives a minimizing request. The minimize can be overriden by setting the events handled property to true.
        Parameters:
        evt - details the minimize request
